channel.title: Welcome to the musings of Chris Gibbons on UX Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to the musings of Chris Gibbons on UX Engineer

item.title: Now
item.description: What Iâ€™m doing now Life is hectic. To help distill things, these are what I am currently focussing my efforts on: Trying to improve my photography - 500px & Instagram. Taking part in GoodRead’s reading challenge. Making an effort to attend more great local industry related events such as McrFred, NUX and UX&D. Learning new technologies - React/TDD/ES2015. This page is inspired by Derik Sivers now page, via Marc Jenkins now page, amongst others.

item.title: Moving To Hugo
item.description: Moving my site from Jekyll to Hugo I had my site on Jekyll, it’s now on Hugo. This article will aim to document my early learnings.
